Player History
Drafted in 26th round, 412nd overall pick, by Seattle in 2015...
Earned first career win on 5/27/2015...
Was claimed off waivers by Houston on 7/6/2015.
Released by Houston on 7/10/2015...
Signed as a free agent by Detroit on 2/26/2016 to a 2-year deal worth $3,400,000 per year...
Was claimed off waivers by St. Louis (C) on 3/11/2017.
Injured on 6/25/2017 with a Stiff Shoulder, out for one week...
7/31/2017: Signed a contract extension with St. Louis (C), $1,910,000 per year, for 2 years.
